attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many parents - particularly mothers but not exclusively - find it difficult to return to work after the birth of their child due to the cost of childcare. Some schemes exist for employers to provide tax deductible childcare but this is not widespread. To encourage enterprise, skills and economic growth we would petition the government to make all Ofsted registered childcare a valid tax deductible expense.
